intro.title: Welcome to Nuclear Documentation
intro.description: Welcome to the comprehensive documentation for Nuclear, a powerful application built with modern web technologies. This documentation covers everything you need to know about the Prisma abstraction layer and how to effectively use it in your projects.

prisma-abstraction/block.title: Block Management
prisma-abstraction/block.description: The Block module provides comprehensive type-safe CRUD operations and utility functions for managing content blocks (posts) in the Nuclear application. This module handles block creation, updates, deletion, and complex relationship queries.

prisma-abstraction/fill-in-the-blank.title: Fill-in-the-Blank
prisma-abstraction/fill-in-the-blank.description: The Fill-in-the-Blank module provides comprehensive type-safe CRUD operations and utility functions for managing interactive fill-in-the-blank content in the Nuclear application. This module handles content creation, updates, deletion, and advanced search and random selection capabilities.

prisma-abstraction/folder.title: Folder Organization
prisma-abstraction/folder.description: The Folder module provides comprehensive type-safe CRUD operations and utility functions for managing hierarchical folder structures in the Nuclear application. This module handles folder creation, updates, deletion, and complex parent-child relationship queries.

prisma-abstraction/points-update.title: Points System
prisma-abstraction/points-update.description: The Points Update module provides comprehensive type-safe CRUD operations and utility functions for managing points and progress tracking in the Nuclear application. This module handles points creation, updates, deletion, and advanced aggregation and analysis capabilities.

prisma-abstraction/question.title: Question Management
prisma-abstraction/question.description: The Question module provides comprehensive type-safe CRUD operations and utility functions for managing questions in the Nuclear application. This module handles question creation, updates, deletion, and relationship queries with blocks.

prisma-abstraction/quiz.title: Quiz System
prisma-abstraction/quiz.description: The Quiz module provides comprehensive type-safe CRUD operations and utility functions for managing quizzes in the Nuclear application. This module handles quiz creation, updates, deletion, and complex relationship queries with blocks and topics.

prisma-abstraction/README.title: Prisma Abstraction Layer
prisma-abstraction/README.description: The Prisma abstraction layer provides a comprehensive, type-safe interface for all database operations in Nuclear. This layer abstracts away the complexity of direct Prisma queries while maintaining full type safety and providing additional utility functions.

prisma-abstraction/topic.title: Topic Management
prisma-abstraction/topic.description: The Topic module provides comprehensive type-safe CRUD operations and utility functions for managing topics in the Nuclear application. This module handles topic creation, updates, deletion, and advanced search and filtering capabilities.

prisma-abstraction/user.title: User Management
prisma-abstraction/user.description: The User module provides comprehensive type-safe CRUD operations and utility functions for managing users in the Nuclear application. This module handles user creation, updates, deletion, and relationship queries.
